title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You may think all eyes are on you today, triggering feelings of self-consciousness. The truth is youre probably right since gorgeous Venus is traveling through your 1st House of Appearances. But you likely have little reason to worry about appearances, allowing you to be even bolder with your existing fashion sense. Luckily, opportunities arise that can enhance your social life now. Engage in pleasant exchanges with strangers and intimates alike at lively social events. In other words, dont shy away when you can shine. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
